data.comment: The match is underway at Gazprom Arena.
Ural Yekaterinburg are caught offside.
In the minute 3, Igor Panin signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Saint Petersburg push upfield and Artem Dzyuba gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Ural Yekaterinburg defence.
In the minute 5, Malcom (Saint Petersburg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Pogrebnyak Pavel of Ural Yekaterinburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 7, Igor Panin awards Saint Petersburg a goal kick.
Saint Petersburg's Artem Dzyuba gets in a shot on goal at Gazprom Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Saint Petersburg.
Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Saint Petersburg territory.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
In the minute 13, Throw-in high up the field for Ural Yekaterinburg in Saint Petersburg.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Othman El Kabir breaks free at Gazprom Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint Petersburg goal kick.
In the minute 15, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg territory.
Saint Petersburg have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 17, Sardar Azmoun heads in to make it 1-0 at Gazprom Arena.
Aleksey Sutormin instrumental with a fine assist.
Ball safe as Saint Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 19, Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Goal! Saint Petersburg extend their lead to 2-0 through Sardar Azmoun.
In the minute 22, Great play from Artem Dzyuba to set up the goal.
Igor Panin awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 25, Igor Panin signals a throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg, close to Saint Petersburg's area.
Saint Petersburg have a goal kick.
Throw-in Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Gazprom Arena.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg at Gazprom Arena.
In the minute 29, Saint Petersburg have been given a penalty...
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Petersburg.
Saint Petersburg have extended their lead to 3-0 courtesy of a Artem Dzyuba penalty.
In the minute 32, Ural Yekaterinburg will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Saint Petersburg.
Rafal Augustyniak for Ural Yekaterinburg has been booked by Igor Panin and receives a first yellow card.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 34, Ural Yekaterinburg make their first substitution with Chingiz Magomadov replacing Nikolay Zolotov.
Yaroslav Rakitskiy is back on his feet again.
Igor Panin waits before resuming play because Yaroslav Rakitskiy for Saint Petersburg is still down.
In the minute 36, In Saint Petersburg, Artem Dzyuba (Saint Petersburg) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In Saint Petersburg, Pogrebnyak Pavel of Ural Yekaterinburg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 38, Igor Panin signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 40, Pogrebnyak Pavel (Ural Yekaterinburg) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Saint Petersburg at Gazprom Arena.
Igor Panin signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
In the minute 42, Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
Saint Petersburg advance rapidly upfield but Igor Panin blows for offside.
Ball safe as Saint Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 44, Goal! Douglas Santos extends Saint Petersburg's lead to 4-0.
Sardar Azmoun with an assist there.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Saint Petersburg.
Yuriy Matveev is making the team's second substitution at Gazprom Arena with Aleksey Evseev replacing Andrey Egorychev.
Aleksey Gerasimov is replacing Danijel Miskic for the away team.
In the minute 48, Igor Panin signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Vladimir Rykov has been booked in Saint Petersburg.
Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Saint Petersburg needs to be cautious. Ural Yekaterinburg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Saint Petersburg at Gazprom Arena.
Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Igor Panin awards Saint Petersburg a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Othman El Kabir for Ural Yekaterinburg drives towards goal at Gazprom Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Saint Petersburg's Artem Dzyuba goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 56, Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint Petersburg goal kick.
Saint Petersburg drives forward and Malcom gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 57, In Saint Petersburg Saint Petersburg attack through Sardar Azmoun. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Petersburg.
The home team have replaced Artem Dzyuba with Daler Kuzyaev. This is the first substitution made today by Sergey Semak.
In the minute 58, The home team replace Sebastian Driussi with Danila Prokhin.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint Petersburg's half?
Yuriy Matveev (Ural Yekaterinburg) is making a fourth substitution, with Artem Shabolin replacing Othman El Kabir.
In the minute 61, Saint Petersburg's Danila Prokhin breaks free at Gazprom Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Petersburg.
In Saint Petersburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint Petersburg's half?
In the minute 65, Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Igor Panin signals a throw-in for Saint Petersburg, close to Ural Yekaterinburg's area.
In the minute 68, Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
Wendel is on a sub for Yaroslav Rakitskiy for Saint Petersburg.
Free kick Ural Yekaterinburg.
In Saint Petersburg, Ural Yekaterinburg push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 72, Saint Petersburg are pushing forward but Daler Kuzyaev's finish is wide of the goal.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 75, An attacking Saint Petersburg player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
At Gazprom Arena, Chingiz Magomadov has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Saint Petersburg are going well in Saint Petersburg. They now lead 5-0 thanks to a Sardar Azmoun penalty.
In the minute 77, Evgeniy Tatarinov is on a sub for Pogrebnyak Pavel for Ural Yekaterinburg.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
In the minute 80, In Saint Petersburg Saint Petersburg drive forward through Magomed Ozdoev. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
Stanislav Krapukhin is replacing Sardar Azmoun for Saint Petersburg at Gazprom Arena.
In the minute 81, Sergey Semak is making the team's fifth substitution at Gazprom Arena with Andrey Mostovoy replacing Magomed Ozdoev.
Igor Panin awards Saint Petersburg a goal kick.
Artem Shabolin (Ural Yekaterinburg) heads in to reduce the deficit. The score is now 5-1.
In the minute 82, That's a fine assist from Eric Bicfalvi.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Yuri Zhirkov for Saint Petersburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 84, Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Gazprom Arena.
Daler Kuzyaev for Saint Petersburg drives towards goal at Gazprom Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Eric Bicfalvi gets in a shot on goal at Gazprom Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
Denys Kulakov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 87, Saint Petersburg have a goal kick.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Igor Panin awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
Ural Yekaterinburg push forward at Gazprom Arena and Eric Bicfalvi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Saint Petersburg defence.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Saint Petersburg.
Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg territory.
Saint Petersburg's Danila Prokhin misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Gazprom Arena.
Full-time! The final score is 5-1.
